items.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
items.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

items.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
items.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

items.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
items.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

items.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
items.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.
